descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][size=4]This MOD adds a Male standalone followers, Abram and Kageyoshi.[/size]

In addition, a small dungeon is added to the Helgen northeast, and the Strong Boss is arranged.
Once you defeat the Boss, you can get the magic and shout.

Followers Lv5-120, Essential, marriage Allowed.[/b]

[b][color=#b6d7a8][size=4]Abram[/size][/color][/b]--------------------------------------------------------------------------
   [b][color=#a4c2f4]Class[/color][/b] : Martial Artist (Unarmed, Heavy-armor, Light-armor)
   [b][color=#a4c2f4]Spell[/color][/b] : Aura knuckle, roar (Staggering, Frenzy effect)
   [b][color=#a4c2f4]Location[/color][/b] : The Bee and Barb, Riften
[/size][size=3][color=#e06666]    (Abram is equipped with a dedicated weapon for bare hands (also used players allowed
     Bare hands weapons can be strengthened. Also can be created in the iron category.)
    (Aura knuckle will not activate when nchanted to Bare Hands weapon.)[/color]

[b][color=#b6d7a8][size=4]Kageyoshi[/size][/color][/b]---------------------------------------------------------------------
   [b][color=#a4c2f4]Class[/color][/b] : Blade master (One-Hand(Dual), Light-armor)
   [b][color=#a4c2f4]Spell[/color][/b] : Elemental Fury, Conjure Katana (autonomous)
   [b][color=#a4c2f4]Location[/color][/b] : Four Shields Tavern, Dragon Bridge


[b][color=#b6d7a8][size=4][Credits][/size][/color][/b]
   [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/][size=3]Enhance Character Edit[/size][/url][size=3] by tktk
   [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?][size=3]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces[/size][/url][size=3] by Chris57
   [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/][size=3]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/size][/url][size=3] by xp32
   [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221/?][size=3]KS Hairdos[/size][/url][size=3] - 265 by Kalilies
